title.rendered: Asia Cup 2023 schedule announced, India to face Pakistan on September 2

content.rendered:
Asia Cup 2023 schedule has been announced, with the tournament to begin on August 30 and the final to be played on September 17. Pakistan will face Nepal in the opener in Pakistan’s Multan.

Read Also: Imagined myself playing for India so many times: Yashasvi on debut

India will face Pakistan in their group match in Sri Lanka’s Kandy on September 2. India will face Nepal in Kandy on September 4.
